meanings.definition: A woman who serves drinks in a bar.
meanings.sent1: The friendly barmaids greeted the customers with smiles.
meanings.sent2: The barmaids were busy mixing cocktails behind the counter.
meanings.sent3: The barmaids joked with the regulars while pouring drinks.
meanings.sent4: The barmaids were like cheerful butterflies fluttering around the bar.
meanings.sent5: The image of the barmaids serving drinks stayed in my mind.

meanings.sent1: Last night, the barmaids worked late shifts at the pub.
meanings.sent2: The group of barmaids chatted during their break time.
meanings.sent3: The barmaids' laughter filled the bar with joy.
meanings.sent4: The barmaids stood out in their colorful uniforms.
meanings.sent5: The barmaids' teamwork was impressive to watch.
